LanguageData.PsychicInsanityLance.label: psychic insanity lance
LanguageData.PsychicInsanityLance.description: A one-use psychic effector. It overwhelms the target's mind with terrifying perceptual distortions, driving him into a berserk state. There is a risk of brain damage. It works at long distances, and through walls.
LanguageData.PsychicShockLance.label: psychic shock lance
LanguageData.PsychicShockLance.description: A one-use psychic effector. It shocks the target's mind with chaotic images, blocking coherent perception and dropping him into a state of psychic shock. There is a risk of brain damage. It works at long distances, and through walls.
LanguageData.PsychicAnimalPulser.label: psychic animal pulser
LanguageData.PsychicAnimalPulser.description: A one-use broad-wave psychic effector. The psychic pulse fills lower minds with terrifying imagery, driving all animals in the region into a manhunting rage.
LanguageData.PsychicSoothePulser.label: psychic soothe pulser
LanguageData.PsychicSoothePulser.description: A one-use broad-wave psychic effector. The psychic pulse induces self-satisfying perceptual distortions, giving a temporary mood boost to everyone in the region.
